name: Bow Hunter 2017 West
description:
Bow Hunter 2017 West is a deer hunting simulation in the American Southwest and Northwest for white tail, black tail, and mule deer. Bow Hunter 2017 East, a sister product, is a deer hunting simulation in the American Southeast and Northeast for white tail deer. This new version of Bow Hunter has many bug fixes, faster load times, more rewards for players, more Cash Hunts, and other great new features.

Both simulations provide stalking and tree stand hunts, require camouflage, and good hunting techniques to accomplish successful hunts!

Choose the right bows, the right arrows, the right camouflage to get your shot to score!

Play in tournaments against other players for in game rewards and real cash prizes!

The deer in the 2017 simulation are easily spooked and will run quickly from the hunter if the hunter does not use the proper bow hunting techniques including the right camouflage!

The simulation contains over 100 hunts, with increasing difficulty, requiring better and better equipment, techniques, and hunting expertise.
